summary: A simple mod that i put together for those who would like the default, ugly fox skin to be replaced with something a bit more high definition.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/vMgwwdp.jpg[/img]

[size=4]
[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/y1XH8mX.jpg[/img]


[color=#ff0000][size=4]-- THIS IS ONLY A RETEXTURE. PLEASE DO NOT EXPECT A FULLY REMODELLED FOX PRIOR DOWNLOADING -- [/size][/color]


[size=4][b]Installation:[/b]

Simple extract the folder/files into your Skyrim directory. After doing so, just ensure that
the fox.dds file can be found in Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\textures\actors. If
the file is in-fact there, then the installation was a success! If it is not, simply copy the
fox.dds file to that exact location.[/size][size=4][/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/gI7vXWc.jpg[/img][/center]
author: Fi5h1fishy
